articles.title: Why Chimerix Is Trading Higher By Over 19%, Here Are 53 Stocks Moving In Monday's Mid-Day Session
articles.content:
Gainers

Advanced Human Imaging Limited (NASDAQ: AHI) shares jumped 53% to $1.04. Advanced Human Imaging announced Sunday it signed a Master Services Agreement with Estonia-based Activate Health OÃœ.
American Virtual Cloud Technologies, Inc.  (NASDAQ: AVCT) rose 41.4% to $0.2068. American Virtual Cloud Technologies shares gained around 8% on Friday after the company announced changes to its board of directors and management team, along with the launch of a review to explore the sale of the entire business or selected assets.
Minerva Neurosciences, Inc. (NASDAQ: NERV) jumped 25% to $12.96. Point72 Asset Management recently reported an 8.8% passive stake in the company.
Pinduoduo Inc. (NASDAQ: PDD) shares gained 23.5% to $71.11 after the company reported better-than-expected Q2 revenue results.
Starbox Group Holdings Ltd. (NASDAQ: STBX) rose 23.1% to $6.55 after dropping 25% on Friday.
The OLB Group, Inc.  (NASDAQ: OLB) rose 20.1% to $2.03 after jumping 43% on Friday. OLB Group recently posted 1H sales of $17.16 million.
Hill International, Inc. (NYSE: HIL) jumped 20% to $3.36 following an updated merger agreement with Global Infrastructure Solutions which offers Hill shareholders $3.40 per share in cash versus $2.85 per share offered previously.
Chimerix, Inc.  (NASDAQ: CMRX) gained 19.4% to $2.58 after the company won a Department of Health and Human Services contract worth $126.9 million.
Sentage Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ: SNTG) shares climbed 17.8% to $3.24. Sentage Holdings, last month, reported FY21 operating revenue of $2.26 million.
NeuroOne Medical Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ: NMTC) climbed 15.5% to $2.07. NeuroOne Medical Tech recently posted a quarterly loss of $0.17 per share.
Bright Minds Biosciences Inc. (NASDAQ: DRUG) shares rose 14.9% to $2.93 after declining around 12% on Friday.
Grindrod Shipping Holdings Ltd. (NASDAQ: GRIN) gained 14.9% to $23.55 after Taylor Maritime delivered a non-binding proposal to acquire the company for $26 per share.
China Automotive Systems, Inc. (NASDAQ: CAAS) jumped 14.4% to $3.97.
Netcapital Inc. (NASDAQ: NCPL) gained 12.2% to $3.5680.
Reviva Pharmaceuticals Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: RVPH) gained 11.7% to $1.7087.
NexGen Energy Ltd. (NYSE: NXE) gained 9.9% to $4.4950.
TAL Education Group (NYSE: TAL) jumped 9.7% to $6.57.
Cameco Corporation (NYSE: CCJ) gained 8% ...
